contents: Article 12 (Function) The general meeting of members deliberates and resolves the following agenda items and obtains approval from the chairman. Revised May 15, 2017, December 26, 2022. 1. Appointment and dismissal of executives under the authority of the general meeting of members 2. Approval of deliberation and settlement of budget 3. Establishment of business plan and approval of business report 4. Regulations Amendment [Moved from Article 9, Previous Article 12 moved to Article 19 May 15, 2017]
